title: ABB Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of ABB Ltd (Symbol: ABB) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $19.27, changing hands as high as $19.37 per share. ABB Ltd shares are currently trading up about 1.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of ABB shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, ABB's low point in its 52 week range is $17.71 per share, with $24.45 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $19.33.
